refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all the MUVES components that are known as a result of a prior read_muves command.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists all the MUVES components that are known as a result of a prior read_muves command.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the t_muves command to list all the known MUVES components.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
